document.full_text: uncle mo and dialed in were still looming as the likely favorites for saturday's $2 million kentucky derby even after more than a week of heavy rain threatened to disrupt the final preparations of some runners.
document.title: dialed in and uncle mo favorites for kentucky derby
lines_and_colors: uncle mo and dialed in were still looming as the likely favorites for saturday's $2 million kentucky derby even after more than a week of heavy rain threatened to disrupt the final preparations of some runners.
